title: No, a Phone Didn’t Explode... It Was an Electric Scooter Battery
subtitle: Viral Video Fact Check of Electric Scooter Battery Exploding: The video is not of a phone exploding while on charge, but the battery of an electric scooter in China’s Shanghai.
author: www.thequint.com
vclaim:
CCTV footage of a device exploding while being charged has gone viral on social media with the claim that it is a phone which burst aflame after being put on charge overnight.

The video has been shared with the message: “रात को फोन चार्ज में रखकर सोना नहीं चाहिए”
